title: (x) Anberlin band logo on "Cities" cd cover - similar to ITC Lubalin Graph {Andreas S}
content:
Can anyone help me with the font that anberlin used as the heading on their “cities” album cover?

My closest guess was rockwell

[http://www.toothandnail.com/myspace/anberlin\_largegraphic.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009211544/http:/www.toothandnail.com/myspace/anberlin_largegraphic.jpg "http://www.toothandnail.com/myspace/anberlin\_largegraphic.jpg")

Thanks :)

 [‹ (x) Slab serif on Threadless website - Apex Serif {Yves}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009211544/http:/typophile.com/node/34268 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) FIFA World Cup South Africa 2010 logo - custom (similar to Neuland) {Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009211544/http:/typophile.com/node/34266 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nalhcal

comments.content: ITC Lubalin Graph is indeed the closest match, as Memphis has a smaller x-height, but you’ll still need to modify both overall character shapes and smaller details to get a perfect match.
That’s what I like so much about the Typophile Type ID Board — you often get complimentary music reviews with your type identification. ;^) :^D
